title: Web Page Design (Automatic Judge)
name: Page renders
description: The HTML page should render and should look like a web page that a user could access.

title: Web Page Design (Automatic Judge)
name: Tic Tac Toe Board
description: The page should have a component that resembles a tic tac toe board. There must be three rows and three columns. Each cell should be large enough such that a user can click on it to make a move.

title: Web Page Design (Automatic Judge)
name: Game Status
description: The page should have a component that displays the current game status. This could include who's turn it is, whether the game has ended in a win/loss/tie, or whether the game is in progress.
